task_definition_name: Make your first PR by adding some information about yourself in Mifos community app
description:
To introduce you to github workflow, we would like to help you to make your first PR in our community app branch - 'GCI-Contributors'

You have to edit 'Contributors.md' file and add your name, github link and a short bio and create a PR - You can see one example in that file in the repo

Repo link (GCI-Contributors branch) - https://github.com/openMF/community-app/tree/GCI-contributors

File link - https://github.com/openMF/community-app/blob/GCI-contributors/CONTRIBUTORS.md
